synopsis.text:
State of Di's troops threatened the tranquility of the Nanzhou era, aiming to abduct the enigmatic Fairy Lady of Snow Shadow. Enter Ye Chen, an ancient immortal hailing from the 21st century, who wielded arcane forces to thwart their nefarious plans. Concealing a clandestine secret behind his audacious demeanor and nonchalant grin, Ye Chen unveiled his true identity to the Fairy Lady. As they crossed paths, one can't help but wonder if destiny played a role in their serendipitous encounter.

Assuming the role of master at Yi Hong Yuan, Ye Chen ventured towards Bei Di, vowing to aid the Snow Maiden's saints in their time of need. Little did he anticipate the unforeseen challenges that lay ahead.

Once a celestial deity, Ye Chen descended into a harmonious realm teeming with powerful nations and formidable states. For centuries, his legendary existence persevered, amassing unparalleled strength. However, the divine influence from his former world began seeping into this new reality, sparking a ruthless and barbaric conflict.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
